description: Led the migration of a legacy monolithic application to a micro-frontend architecture using React and Module Federation.
Improved site performance by 35% through code splitting, lazy loading, and image optimization.
Mentored junior developers and established coding standards for the frontend team.
Developed responsive and accessible websites for diverse clients using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.
Collaborated closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs and complex animations.
Integrated Headless CMS solutions (Strapi, Contentful) to enable content management for non-technical clients.
Assisted in building UI components and fixing bugs for the company's main product.
Gained hands-on experience with modern JavaScript (ES6+) and Git version control.
Participated in daily stand-ups and sprint planning meetings.
